tldr: Out of bounds memory access in Compositing in Google Chrome prior to 123.0.6312.122 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the GPU process to potentially perform a sandbox escape via specific UI gestures. (Chromium security severity: High)
doest_this_affect_me: You're affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges.
how_to_fix: Upgrade electron library to patch version.
